summary: This document is an email from Lesley Groff to Paul Morris regarding a meeting request from Jeffrey Epstein. Epstein is looking to meet with Paul and others on September 5th or 6th, with availability in the morning until 1 PM on the 5th and a more flexible schedule on the 6th.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is the sender of the email, coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the recipient of the email, being asked to coordinate a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is requesting a meeting with Paul Morris and others.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff sent an email to Paul Morris regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
Jeffrey Epstein is available to meet on September 5th or 6th, 2013.
The meeting is proposed to take place in the morning until 1 PM on September 5th.
